nodes.text: TC-70 was Jabba Desilijic Tiure's protocol droid during the time of the Clone Wars. When Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi went to negotiate with the Hutt upon Rotta's kidnapping, TC-70 helped to translate her master and the Jedi's conversation. The droid stated that Jabba wanted his son back and the kidnappers found either dead or alive. She also received Anakin Skywalker as he entered Jabba's palace in search of his Padawan, she asked for the Jedi's lightsaber, which he then recovered.

The droid was also present for the negotiations between Jabba and bounty hunter Cad Bane over the job of securing the plans to the Senate Building and securing the release of Ziro Desilijic Tiure following his imprisonment for involvement in the kidnapping of Rotta. TC-70 also translated the conversation of the members of the Hutt Grand Council for Bane, revealing their intentions to free Ziro to keep certain secrets of the Hutt crime syndicates safe.

TC-70 served as the translator for Pantoran Baron Notluwiski Papanoida during his conversation with Jabba following a confrontation with Jabba's bounty hunter, Greedo, during his search for his abducted daughters, Chi Eekway and Che Amanwe.
By 20 BBY, as Darth Maul established the Shadow Collective, TC-70 was no longer serving as Jabba's translator.
TC-70 was voiced by Nika Futterman, who also voiced Asajj Ventress and Sy Snootles.
